```{r}
source('helpers.R')

source("helpers.R")
df = read_xlsx(paste0(figdir, 'Figure B.1 - Data.xlsx'))
df$power = df$power*100
```

Determine denominator degrees of freedom for each estimation

  - Main Effects: 2 parameters (intercept + condition) 
  - Interaction Effects: 4 parameters

```{r}
ggplot(data = df, aes(x = effsize, y = power, color = model)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1) + 
  geom_line(size = 1) + 
  xlab("Cohen's f") + ylab("% Power") + 
  scale_x_continuous(trans='log', breaks = c(0.002, 0.02, 0.2)) + 
  facet_grid(analysis ~ country) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c("goldenrod1", "grey70")) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(legend.position = 'bottom', legend.title = element_blank())

ggsave(paste0(figdir, "Figure B.1 - Power.png"), height = 6, width = 6)
```
